model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver<IBallCmd>

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver<IBallCmd>
    The Ball shape object that moves inside given region, itself defined by update strategy, paint strategy and canvas region.

    • Field Detail

      • location

        private java.awt.Point location
        The location of the shape's center

      • velocity

        private java.awt.Point velocity
        The velocity of the shape

      • checkCondition

        private boolean checkCondition
        A flag made for strategy convenience

      • color

        private java.awt.Color color
        color of the shape

      • radius

        private int radius
        Radius of a ball. Often will be used to get a measure of the ball's 'mass' if a strategy hasn't given the ball a value to use

      • mass

        private double mass
        'Mass' of a ball. If this is not initialized by a strategy, then other strategies will default to using radius instead of this field.

      • pnlCanvas

        javax.swing.JPanel pnlCanvas
        Panel to be painted on.

      • updateStrategy

        private IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> updateStrategy
        The strategy used by the ball for moving around the canvas

      • paintStrategy

        private IPaintStrategy paintStrategy
        The strategy used by the ball for displaying itself on the canvas

      • interactStrategy

        private IInteractStrategy<IBallCmd> interactStrategy
        The strategy used by the ball to interact with others

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball(int xPos,
            int yPos,
            int xVel,
            int yVel,
            int radius,
            java.awt.Color color,
            javax.swing.JPanel pnlCanvas)
        Constructor of Ball
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x coordinate position of the ball
        yPos - the y coordinate position of the ball
        xVel - the x velocity of the ball
        yVel - the y velocity of the ball
        radius - the radius of the ball
        color - the color of the ball
        pnlCanvas - the panel to which the ball will be painted
